document_data.name: Realm of Wailing Fog
document_data.mainbody:
The '''Realm of Wailing Fog''' was a mysterious land found on the eastern edge of the [[Hullack Forest]] and west of the [[Thunder Peaks]] mountain range in [[Cormyr]].{{Cite dragon/362/Countdown to the Realms: Spellplague: The Wailing Years}}

{{quote|Something thatâ€™s not to be talked about, by any of us or either of you!|A [[dragon]] not willing to talk about the Realm of Wailing Fog}}
document_data.Description: The realm was a collection of permanently mist-covered secluded fens with eerie calls echoing through it. By the 14{{th}} century [[DR]], the misty wetland hid long-ruined towers. Everyone who traversed the Hullack Forest or passed along the [[East Way]] that curved south towards the nearby Realm of Wailing Fog, testified of a strange and sinister feeling of being watched.
document_data.History: During the century that followed the [[Spellplague]], the magical chaos did not affect the Realm of Wailing Fog. The land remade a forbidding mystery. None dared enter the Realm, not even the [[Eldreth Veluuthra]]. In the 15{{th}} century DR, there were unsubstantiated rumors that claimed that the Realm of Wailing Fog was home to a coven of [[hag]]s.
